meanings.sent1: The rabbit hastens across the field.
meanings.sent2: She hastens to catch the bus every morning.
meanings.sent3: The wind hastens the leaves to dance in circles.
meanings.sent4: Time hastens like a river flowing towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: His heart hastens with excitement as he nears the finish line.

meanings.definition: To cause something to happen sooner
meanings.sent1: Adding yeast hastens the bread's rise.
meanings.sent2: The announcement hastens the start of the event.
meanings.sent3: The early morning coffee hastens the awakening process.
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement hastens the completion of the project.
meanings.sent5: The rain hastens the growth of the plants in the garden.

meanings.sent1: He hastens to finish his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The workers hasten to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hastens to gather nuts before winter.
meanings.sent4: The news of the sale hastens customers to the store.
meanings.sent5: The children hasten to the playground after school.
